tag.name: text
tag.description: An input tag of type text together with an optional lable and optional lookup

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page

attribute.name: lookup
attribute.description: A lookup function to use and the parameter. Parameters are: tbl(..) The name of the view or table from where to read the values rco(..) A space separated list of columns whose value should be moved to the elements mention in rid() after selecting one record. rid(..) A space separated list of element ids of the elements to receive selected values Further optional parameters: sco(..) A space separated list of columns which should be use to select from the table rows to display sva(..) A space separated list of values which shall be used to compare the columns from sco(..). Values could be element ids or constants or SQL expressions. Constants must be put in quotes. Id element ids are used, then the column is used for selection only, if the respective element has a value. If not the selection by this column is ignored. sop(..) A list of operators to compare the select columns with the values. Default is = tit(..) An optional titel for the dialog box. the default title is automatically created from the table name.

attribute.name: microHelp
attribute.description: A short description which shows up when mouse moves over the field

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only rdo: read only upc: uppercase dec(m,n): m-digits of which n are after the decimal min(n): input must be less thann n max(n):input must be greater than n pat(): A regular expression pattern req: required len(n): maximum length of input is n siz(n): field size shall be n

attribute.name: options
attribute.description: Other attributes to assign to the control

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: icon
attribute.description: Bootstrap's FontAwesome icon class to display. The icon will be display in the same place as lookup and will overwrite lookup icon and functionality.

attribute.name: iconClick
attribute.description: Expression for onclick of icon set by icon attribute

attribute.name: autoLookup
attribute.description: Indicates whether upon input the system should automatically check against database and display additional values. Y: Checks with same selections as specified under lookup If you want additional specifications on top of what was specified under lookup, you need put instead of Y sco and sva into it. sco(...) The columns which shall be used in addition to the sco(...) under lookup sva(...) The values which shall be checked in addition to sva(...) under lookup sop(...) The operators which are used in addition to sop(...) under lookup. LIKE operator will be used to fill up missing operator in sop taken from lookup N(): Exclude condition specified under lookup from autolookup pop(): Use popover dialog (requires label)

tag.name: number
tag.description: An input tag of type number together with an optional lable and optional lookup

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page

attribute.name: lookup
attribute.description: A lookup function to use and the parameter

attribute.name: microHelp
attribute.description: A short description which shows up when mouse moves over the field

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only rdo: read only upc: uppercase dec(m,n): m-digits of which n are after the decimal min(n): input must be less than n max(n):input must be greater than n pat(): A regular expression pattern req: required len(n): maximum length of input is n siz(n): field size shall be n

attribute.name: options
attribute.description: Other attributes to assign to the control

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: icon
attribute.description: Bootstrap's FontAwesome icon class to display. The icon will be display at the end of select dropdown.

attribute.name: iconClick
attribute.description: Expression for onclick of icon set by icon attribute

attribute.name: step
attribute.description: The number by which pressing up/down or a spinner shall increase or decrease the value. Default is "1". Could be any decimal like "0.1".

attribute.name: withSpinner
attribute.description: Whether right to the input field up/down buttons should be placed, which will increase or decrease the value by the amount given in step.

tag.name: select
tag.description: A select tag of type together with an optional lable and micro help. The tag can have the option values explicitly set by the parameters optionsList and valueList or can receive these values from a standard select table given by the parameter selectTable. If the tag is required, an option showing the label + a ? is shown to indicate, that there needs to be a value. If the tag is optional an empty option is automatically inserted. In this case parameter emptyDisplay can be used to set a display text for such option. This is useful when a select tag is used within a search area.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page

attribute.name: microHelp
attribute.description: A short description which shows up when mouse moves over the field

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only = read only req: required

attribute.name: options
attribute.description: Other attributes to assign to the control

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: selectTable
attribute.description: The name of a standard RCL select table to use

attribute.name: valueList
attribute.description: A space separated list of select values

attribute.name: optionsList
attribute.description: A space separated list of select options to display

attribute.name: emptyDisplay
attribute.description: A text to be displayed for optional fields instead of a space like Select One

attribute.name: icon
attribute.description: Bootstrap's FontAwesome icon class to display. The icon will be display at the end of select dropdown.

attribute.name: iconClick
attribute.description: Expression for onclick of icon set by icon attribute

tag.name: date
tag.description: An input tag of type date. By framework automatically a date picker is attached to it.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page. Date tags support the following additional default values: +-n today +/- n-days today yesterday tomorrow first|last of last|this|next month

attribute.name: microHelp
attribute.description: A short description which shows up when mouse moves over the field

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only rdo: read only req: required pat(): A regular expression pattern

attribute.name: options
attribute.description: Other attributes to assign to the control

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: icon
attribute.description: Bootstrap's FontAwesome icon class to display. The icon will be display at the end of select dropdown.

attribute.name: iconClick
attribute.description: Expression for onclick of icon set by icon attribute

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: The header title of the search area

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, btn(): classes to be added to the buttons, row(): classes to be added to area footer which only available if using search area mode or use new button.

attribute.name: areaMode
attribute.description: Set area mode. Default to "detail" If "detail": the area will be rendered as detail area. If "search": the area will be rendered as search area which includes find and reset button. The page must contain find() function. If "table": the area will be rendered as Powertable.

attribute.name: newBtn
attribute.description: Whether a new button is required. If required, the page must contain newData() function to intercept button click.

attribute.name: collapsible
attribute.description: Whether the area is collapsible.

attribute.name: useHeader
attribute.description: Whether the area uses area header or not.

attribute.name: buttonList
attribute.description: A space separated list of caption of buttons that will be rendered to footer. Buttons from this attribute will overwrite newBtn and search area default buttons

attribute.name: onClickList
attribute.description: A space separated list of function name to go with button in buttonList.

attribute.name: buttonIdList
attribute.description: A space separated list of button ID to go with button in buttonList.

attribute.name: hidden
attribute.description: Whether the area is hidden by default.

attribute.name: headerOptions
attribute.description: Additional attribute to add to area header. Setting this attribute will make the tag ignores hidden attribute

attribute.name: areaOptions
attribute.description: Additional attribute to add to area. Setting this attribute will make the tag ignores hidden attribute

tag.name: tabGroup
tag.description: A series of tabs which can contain several tab panes with more details. Tab panes are defined by tabContentPane. A complete tabGroup is defined by: tabGroup (Begin) ....tabContentPane 1 (Begin) ........content of pane 1 ....tabContentPane 1 (End) ....tabContentPane 2 (Begin) ........content of pane 2 ....tabContentPane 2 (End) tabGroup (End)

attribute.name: tabList
attribute.description: A space separated list of tab names. Spaces in tab names are replaced by underscore for display

attribute.name: activeTab
attribute.description: The name of the tab which shall be active as it appears in tabList (with underscore)

tag.name: tabContentPane
tag.description: The frame of one content pane controlled by a list of tabs. This custom tag must be placed inside a tabGroup tag. The content of a tab needs to be placed between the begin and end tag of this custom tag.

attribute.name: tabName
attribute.description: The name of the tab as it appears in the tabList of the tab group (with underscore)

tag.name: dialog
tag.description: The frame of a modal or nonmodal dialog for display or input of data. The content of the dialg needs to be placed in between the start and end tag of this custom tag. The dialog can be opened with rutOpenDialog(dialogId). The dialog can be closed with rutCloseDialog(dialogId).

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element. Default is b0-area.

attribute.name: buttonList
attribute.description: A space separated list of button names

attribute.name: onClickList
attribute.description: A space separated list of functions calls for click on the respective button

attribute.name: cancelMethod
attribute.description: The method to be called upon cancellation

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: The title of the dialog box

attribute.name: modal
attribute.description: True or false depending on whether the dialog box is modal or not. Default is modal

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: The width of the dialog in pixel. Default is auto.

attribute.name: height
attribute.description: The height of the dialog in pixel. Default is auto.

attribute.name: maxWidth
attribute.description: The maximum width of the dialog in pixel.

attribute.name: maxHeight
attribute.description: The maximum height of the dialog in pixel.

attribute.name: minWidth
attribute.description: The minimum width of the dialog in pixel.

attribute.name: minHeight
attribute.description: The mainimum height of the dialog in pixel.

attribute.name: draggable
attribute.description: Whether the dialog can be dragged by the user. Default is true.

attribute.name: resizable
attribute.description: Whether the user can resize the dialog. Default is true.

attribute.name: position
attribute.description: Allows to specify the position of the dialog relative to another element. Please refer to JQuery Dialog API for details.

tag.name: stdShipmentType
tag.description: A specialized select tag displaying the standard select table shipmentType.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed. Default: Shipm.Type

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only rdo: read only req: required

attribute.name: options
attribute.description: Other attributes to assign to the control

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: emptyDisplay
attribute.description: A text to be displayed for optional fields instead of a space like Select One

attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only rdo: read only req: required

attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: emptyDisplay
attribute.description: A text to be displayed for optional fields instead of a space like Select One

tag.name: stdVessel
tag.description: A specialized input tag which automatically provides a lookup table for vessel. It also provides a label (Vessel) and check=len(5) upc. If the field is display only, then there will be no lookup table.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: nameId
attribute.description: The id of an html element, which shall display the vessel name

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only rdo: read only req: required

attribute.name: options
attribute.description: Other attributes to assign to the control

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: id

attribute.name: nameId
attribute.description: The id of an html element, which shall display the port name

attribute.name: label

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

tag.name: stdVoyage
tag.description: A specialized input tag which automatically provides a lookup table for voyage. It also provides a label (Voyage) and check=len(10) upc. If the field is display only, then there will be no lookup table.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only std: read only req: required

attribute.name: serviceId
attribute.description: The html id of a service field. this field would be filled from the selected voyage and any input into this field would be used to filter the displayed voyages.

attribute.name: vesselId
attribute.description: The html id of a vessel field. this field would be filled from the selected voyage and any input into this field would be used to filter the displayed voyages.

attribute.name: directionId
attribute.description: The html id of a direction field. this field would be filled from the selected voyage and any input into this field would be used to filter the displayed voyages.

attribute.name: options
attribute.description: Other attributes to assign to the control

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

tag.name: map
tag.description: A tag for generating SelectTable map with js function to retrieve value from code using $mapToValue(table, code) For the list of standard select tables given under the parameter selectTable a js map function $mapToValue(table,code) is generated, which maps the code to values for use on html pages.

attribute.name: selectTable
attribute.description: A list of stabdard select tables which shall be extracted into the map

tag.name: valueMap
tag.description: Similar to rcl:map. Deprecated, please use rcl:map

attribute.name: table
attribute.description: Space separated list of StdSelectTables

tag.name: slider
tag.description: An input element which allows to set a numberic value by dragging a handle between a minimum and a maximum. Can be enriched by additional input field, spinner and value display.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page.

attribute.name: microHelp
attribute.description: A short description which shows up when mouse moves over the field

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only rdo: read only req: required dec(m,n): m-digits of which n are after the decimal min(n): input must be less than n. Default=0 max(n):input must be greater than n. Default=100

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: withSpinner
attribute.description: Whether right to the spinner buttons to increase/decrease the value should be placed. Value: "Y" place a spinner. Default is "N".

attribute.name: withValueDisplay
attribute.description: Whether the actual value shall be displayed at the right side of the lable. Value: "Y" display the value. Default is "Y".

attribute.name: withIntegratedField
attribute.description: Whether a numeric field shall be available right to the slider, which will allow a manual input. Value: "Y" place an input field. Default is "N".

attribute.name: step
attribute.description: In case of a withSpinner="Y" or an withIntegratedField="Y" the amount by which the value is increased or decreased. Default=1. Could be any decimal like "0.1". "step" has no impact on the slider. The slider can still set any value.

attribute.name: syncElement
attribute.description: It is possible to show the actual value of the slider in a completeley different field of the page. If this is requested this attribute gives the html id of that field.

attribute.name: microHelp
attribute.description: A short description which shows up when mouse moves over the field

tag.name: multiSelect
tag.description: An element which looks like a select tag but allows to select many values together with an optional lable and micro help. The tag can have the option values explicitly set by the parameters optionsList and valueList or can receive these values from a standard select table given by the parameter selectTable. If the tag is required, an option showing the label + a ? is shown to indicate, that there needs to be a value. If the tag is optional an empty option is automatically inserted. In this case parameter emptyDisplay can be used to set a display text for such option. This is useful when a select tag is used within a search area.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: itemClick
attribute.description: A Javascript function to be called, when an individual selected item is clicked. The function will be provided with the following parameters: id: The id of the multiSelect element value: The value of the element being clicked event: The click event object item: The element being clicked upon. This element has an attribute data-id, which is the displayed option.

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page

attribute.name: microHelp
attribute.description: A short description which shows up when mouse moves over the field

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: disabled rdo: read only req: required

attribute.name: options
attribute.description: Other attributes to assign to the control

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: selectTable
attribute.description: The name of a standard RCL select table to use

attribute.name: valueList
attribute.description: A space separated list of select values

attribute.name: optionsList
attribute.description: A space separated list of select options to display

attribute.name: emptyDisplay
attribute.description: A text to be displayed for optional fields instead of a space like Select One

tag.name: radioGroup
tag.description: An input tag of type text together with an optional lable and optional lookup

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The id of the created html element

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: The label to be displayed

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A list of classes to be added to the individual parts. The list can contain the following subparts: div(): classes to be added to the overall component, lbl(): classes to be added to the lable, ctr(): classes to be added to the control

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: A value to assign to the control when opening the page

attribute.name: microHelp
attribute.description: A short description which shows up when mouse moves over the field

attribute.name: check
attribute.description: A list of rules which values need to observe. dis: display only rdo: read only req: required

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name attribute

attribute.name: selectTable
attribute.description: The name of a standard RCL select table to use

attribute.name: valueList
attribute.description: A space separated list of values

attribute.name: optionsList
attribute.description: A space separated list of option labels to display. If the list is empty, no descriptive labels are placed to the right of the radio button.

attribute.name: iconType
attribute.description: If set the default radio button is replaced by a font awesome icon (value "fas"). an image (value "img"). a colored circle (value "trafficLight").

attribute.name: iconList
attribute.description: A space separated list of icons to use instead of radio buttons. Requires the attribute "iconType" and the meaning depends on the value of it. a list of font awesome icons. a list of image url. a list of css colors.

attribute.name: withBox
attribute.description: Whether a box shall be drawn around the whole control. Values "Y"=with box or "N" without box (default).

attribute.name: maxCols
attribute.description: By default the radio buttons are placed in one row. If maxCols is specified by an integer number (e.g. 4), then after latest this number of buttons a new row is inserted into the element.
